com.gsma.services.rcs.vsh

Class VideoPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • IVideoPlayer.Stub
      • com.gsma.services.rcs.vsh.VideoPlayer

  • public abstract class VideoPlayer
extends IVideoPlayer.Stub
    Video player offers an interface to manage the video player instance independently of the joyn service. The video player is implemented in the application side. The video player captures the video from the device camera, encodes the video into the selected format and streams the encoded video frames over the network in RTP.
    Author:
    Jean-Marc AUFFRET
